title: Victor Stenger:  The Shroud of Turin might have contained genetic material with no Y-chromosomes
post: In this photo, Stenger has a partial beard (goatee), where does that lead us?  Might contain genetic material without a Y chromosome.  The genetic material might contain a novel form of coding molecule.  Why stop there?  The possibilities are infinite…
author: Kelly Kearse

title: Victor Stenger:  The Shroud of Turin might have contained genetic material with no Y-chromosomes
post: Another clear example of scientism, coming from a physicist who has gone beyond his area of expertise to make tall claims….. and has a lot of homework to do.
author: Louis
